_meanings:
{@--4@} (In
<ab>Rhet.</ab>) Not understood or clearly
intelligible (as a word), one of the
defects of a word {#(Sabdadoza)#}; 
{#apratItaM yatkevale SAstre prasidDaM#} <ls>K. P. 7</ls>, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} a
word is said to be {#apratIta#} if it be
used in a sense which it has in
particular classes of works only
(and not in general or popular use);
{%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} {#samyagjYAnamahAjyotirdalitASayatAjuzaH#}
(where {#ASaya#} = {#vAsanA#} occurs in Yoga
Śāstra only).
